fields.label: (Sub)title of the exercise

fields.label: Functions by measures
fields.description: Enter functions ( T, S, D or M) by measures. One bar may have several functions like TD. Upper/lower case does not matter.

fields.default: Enter the harmonic functions of the musical excerpt -  T, S, D or M (tonic, subdominant, dominant or mediant)
